title: nanubrOva radha
sahitya:
nannubrOva rAdA (rAma) nAmIda dayalEdA



anupallavi



kannavArini yAcincE kaSTamulanu dIrcivEga



caraNam



sharaNAgata rakSakuDani birudAngituDaina nIdu caraNamulE gatiyani nE

sthiramuga nammitinayyA

karuNatOnu nEnaDigina varamulosagi brOcuta nI karudugAnu dOcanA shrI varada

venkaTEsha IvELa
